mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tcm_member ( user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_email, user_zipcode, user_address1, user_address2 )VALUES ( #{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{user_name}, #{user_email}, #{user_zipcode}, #{user_address1}, #{user_address2} )
